entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Toronto
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:14 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 7.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 4:17 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 7.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 7.7°C
Wind: N 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this evening then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
